roles.role: Hosted Apps and Desktops Service Administrator

validation.name: Customer Full Name
validation.errormessage: A valid customer long name must be specified

validation.name: Customer Short Name
validation.errormessage: A valid customer short name must be specified

validation.name: CustomerContactEmail
validation.errormessage: The current contact email address cannot be used.

option.name: Korea, Democratic People s Republic Of
option.value: Korea, Democratic People s Republic Of

option.name: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic Of
option.value: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic Of

option.name: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands
option.value: South Georgia And The South Sandwich Islands

validation.name: UniqueBillingCode
validation.errormessage: The Billing ID is in use by a different customer

property.name: BankAccName
property.description: Name of the customers bank account

property.name: ExonetVersion
property.description: Exonet version number of the customer

property.name: FssPackage
property.description: Package Name for File Sharing Service

property.name: OrganisationalStructure
property.description: Structure to store customer's users in AD

property.name: pwxEmail
property.description: send users details about the password expiry and a summary report to the administrator

property.name: pwxLanguageCode
property.description: The language for sending email to the admin

property.name: pwxSendNotificationReport
property.description: send the administrator the report about lockouts and password expiry etc.

property.name: CustomerOUPattern
property.description: If not blank will overwrite the CustomerOUName

property.name: isDemoCustomer
property.description: If checked this customer is a demo customer. A demo customer will be automatically deprovisioned and deleted after the expiry date.
